question: Tour de Franceâ€™ event, which has been postponed due to Covid-19 outbreak, is related to which sports?
explanation:
The Tour de France is the famous cycling race event of the world. This year the event had been scheduled to be held from June 27 to July 19, 2020.
Recently, the event has been rescheduled from the previous dates and it is expected to take place from August 29 to September 20. This followed the order of the French government which banned large gatherings in the country until at least mid-July. The route of the race remains the same, from Nice to Paris.
